data.title: 以 3 到 5 分钟描写以下主题
data.content: What are your plans for after you graduate? How have your plans changed over time? What are you doing now to achieve your goals?
data.answer: In the short term, my plan after graduation from university is to find a decent job in my major where I can apply what I learnt to work. The place I desire to live has changed from Tier 1 cities to a city that is not far away from my hometown, so that I can also travel back to home on holidays to look after my parents. To achieve my goals, firstly I need to work hard to study my professional knowledge. Moreover, I should conduct the research on which skills and qualifications are required in the current labor market to help me stand out in future employment. A related internship is also necessary to enrich my experience. (118字)
